faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions. Didn't find what you're looking for? Contact us.
faq.contact_subtitle: Don't hesitate to contact us. We'll respond within minutes.

booking_how.question: How can I make a reservation?
booking_how.answer: You can make a reservation via WhatsApp, Telegram, or by phone. Just send us the name of your preferred girl, date, time, and program length. You'll receive confirmation within 5 minutes.

booking_advance.question: Do I need to book in advance?
booking_advance.answer: We recommend booking at least 1-2 hours in advance to ensure your preferred girl's availability. We also accept walk-in visits if capacity allows.

payment_methods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment_methods.answer: We accept cash and credit cards (Visa, Mastercard). Payment is always made at the beginning of the visit. We can issue a receipt upon request.

discretion_how.question: How is discretion ensured?
discretion_how.answer: Our apartments are in regular residential buildings without any signage. We don't keep any client records. A neutral name appears on card statements.

services_included.question: What's included in the price?
services_included.answer: The basic price includes erotic massage, body to body, shared shower, and happy ending. Detailed service breakdown is available in the price list or on each girl's profile.

booking_cancel.question: Can I cancel my reservation?
booking_cancel.answer: Yes, reservations can be canceled free of charge at least 2 hours before the appointment. Late cancellations or no-shows may incur a cancellation fee.

discretion_location.question: Where are the apartments located?
discretion_location.answer: We have two locations in central Prague — Prague 2 (New Town) and Prague 3 (Žižkov). You'll receive the exact address after confirming your reservation.

services_couples.question: Do you provide services for couples?
services_couples.answer: Yes, we offer programs for couples. You can choose a massage for both partners simultaneously or individual programs. Contact us for more information.
